metadata.title: CVE-2024-45492 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in libexpat before 2.6.3. nextScaffoldPart inxmlparse.c can have an integer overflow for m_groupSize on 32-bit platforms(where UINT_MAX equals SIZE_MAX).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-45492` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

expat - 2.6.2-2
libexpat1 - 2.6.2-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: expat package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.6.2-2').
xmlrpc-c package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
wbxml2 package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
swish-e package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
cadaver package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
matanza: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
tdom package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
